name: Schools, Business and Secretarial
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Business and secretarial schools that offer general business training
such as business machine operation, office procedures, word
processing, stenographic, and other clerical skills. Such schools offer
a training certificate but do not offer academic degrees.
For vocational and trade schools, use MCC 8249.
